lead_paragraph: Dylan Thomas, third in the Epsom Derby to Sir Percy last month, galloped to a three-and-a-half-length victory in the Irish Derby at the Curragh yesterday. The colt, ridden by Kieren Fallon for the Irish trainer Aidan O'Brien, was the 9-2 favorite.
snippet: Dylan Thomas, third in the Epsom Derby to Sir Percy last month, galloped to a three-and-a-half-length victory in the Irish Derby at the Curragh yesterday. The colt, ridden by Kieren Fallon for the Irish trainer Aidan O'Brien, was the 9-2 favorite.
